page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: The church in Castletown called, St. Margaret's, was built by a Colonel Briggs. His son in law Gee, was the first minister whose eldest son was killed in the first world war. There was a plaque in the church as a memorial to the son. At present there is no full-time minister. In Town End Farm there are two religious communities, one is the Anglican St. Bede's and the other is the Roman Catholic St. John Bosco. Both churches offer a wide variety of clubs and societies for people and children in the area.
